name: Whale Demo
description:
Experience an exciting adventure in this captivating demo, designed to give you a taste of an incredible journey. Defeat the enemies and restore order inside the whale ship.   

------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------

DEVELOPED BY:

PIZZA P.F.

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 2, 2020/2021)

  • Mattia Tozzoli

3D Art:

  • Daniele Balasso
  • Rodolfo Beccalli
  • Alessandro Gambino

2D Art:

  • Vittorio Ranella
  • Francesco Rivetti

Controls scheme: 

Keyboard: 

Overworld

WASD - Move 
I - Open Inventory
E - Interact 

Battle Arena

Arrows - Select Action & Select Target 
Enter - Confirm Action
R - Undo
